(* Generates a random matrix of size n x n *)

(* Define function to generate random matrix *)
generateRandomMatrix[n_Integer] := Module[{matrix = Table[0, {n}, {n}], i, j},
  For[i = 1, i <= n, i++,
    For[j = 1, j <= n, j++,
      matrix[[i, j]] = RandomReal[];
    ]
  ];
  matrix
]

(* Generate a 5 x 5 random matrix *)
generateRandomMatrix[5]

(* Output: 
{
 0.11789405226604736, 0.46342996726563247, 0.7368777597573265, 0.056596565686884555, 
 0.1973395677776905
},
{
 0.6166055554448135, 0.015695482964082346, 0.301435769787599, 0.5450178593286697, 
 0.6876915068063283
},
{
 0.8874528951856994, 0.4057112604690106, 0.07676410341468176, 0.8289249167610802, 
 0.5665507199823498
},
{
 0.64687686515411, 0.8852318287944051, 0.8505763808347933, 0.7100539837242879, 
 0.9890324310076053
},
{
 0.603998847838256, 0.9022408932126682, 0.6781530122695213, 0.7434841942923029, 
 0.05373180378658621
} 
*)
